suggest.drupal/admin_toolbar: Provides a better UX for the standard admin toolbar
suggest.drupal/menu_item_extras: Make the Menu Link Content entity fully fieldable.
suggest.drupal/menu_link_attributes: This module allows you to add attributes to your menu links or their wrapping <li> elements.
suggest.drupal/request_data_conditions: Defines a set of conditions via the Drupal 8 Conditions Plugin API for use with the context module
suggest.drupal/search_api: Provides a framework for easily creating searches on any entity known to Drupal, using any kind of search engine.
suggest.drupal/views_infinite_scroll: Provides infinite scroll functionality to Views
suggest.drupal/webform: This module allows you to use webforms.
suggest.drupal/node_revision_delete: Provides tools to help manage node revisions and keep your database to a reasonable size.
